title: Reminiscences of Yarrow. Edited and annotated by ... Professor Veitch, LL.D. Illustrated by Tom Scott ... Second edition
author: Russell, James
snippet: The Duke, entering into the joke, said, "I see,my lad, we are your prisoners," and taking out theback of a letter, with his pencil wrote, on the frontof the saddle, "The Duke of Buccleuch, theCountess of Dalkeith [mother of the present Duke1],and Colonel Rutherfurd of Edgerston," and thenhanded it to his captor.
